Quick Start

Create your first Atra page in a few simple steps: 

                            
                                // main.atra
html(lang="en"){
  head(){
    title(){
      text("My Website");
    }
  }
  body(){
    h1(){
      text("Welcome to Atra!");
    }
    p(){
      text("This is my first page.");
    }
  }
}
